name: specialist-only.toml

guard.name: Specialist Access
guard.description: Allows access only to authenticated specialists

rawContent:
# Specialist Only Guard
# Restricts access to authenticated specialists

[guard]
id = "specialist-only"
name = "Specialist Access"
description = "Allows access only to authenticated specialists"

[access]
authenticated = true
roles = ["specialist"]

[redirect]
unauthenticated = "/login"
unauthorized = "/unauthorized"

[relations]
roles = ["specialist"]
routes = ["specialist-home", "specialist-orders", "active-shift", "availability-setup"]
